content: स्मरणं [स्मृ-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Remembering, remembrance, recollection; केवलं स्मरणेनैव पुनासि पुरुषं यतः <ls>R. 10. 29.</ls> {@--2@} Thinking of or about; यदि हरिस्मरणे सरसं मनः <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Memory. {@--4@} Tradition, traditional precept; इति भृगुस्मरणात् (<ab>opp.</ab> श्रुति). {@--5@} Mental recitation of the name of a deity. {@--6@} Remembering with regret, regretting. {@--7@} Rhetorical recollection, regarded as a figure of speech; thus defined: --यथानुभवमर्थस्य दृष्टे तत्सदृशे स्मृतिः स्मरणं <ls>K. P. 10.</ls>
